Did someone also have some experiance with this company? the Internetsite is www.mediconsult.co.at Thank you so much for the support and help Olga

Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2013 01:46PM Olga2819 wrote: Hello all.  Thank you for a good advice! I was operated last week in the University clinic in Innsbruck, Austria. All was arranged by a very very empathic and profesional company named Mediconsult OG (www.mediconsult.co.at). They arranged all treatments, escorted me from arrival in Innsbruck and at all pre operation examinations (MRI of the brest, a new biopsy an so on) and where with me while all talkes to the doctores before and after the surgery, translatins everything for me to russian! and since they are doctors, I believe that the translation was even more profesional than if it was done only by a "normal" translator.  Now i am after the operation and want to thank you for this internett site. If someone wants to be treated in Austria, I definitly recomand the university clinic of Insbruck and this great help from the company Mediconsult OG Thank you, thank you, thank you Olga
Posts.Title: Brest cancer treatment in Austria Olga2819 QuinnCat
